title: Add admin panel page for creating horror stories (title, category, full text)

requirements.text: Create a new admin page that requires the user to be signed in with Internet Identity and provides a form to create a new horror story with fields: Title, Category, and Full story text.

quotes:
Create admin panel to add horror stories.
Each story should have:
Title
Category
Full story text

Show stories on homepage in latest order.
Hindi language supported.

acceptanceCriteria: When not authenticated, the admin story page shows an auth-required state with a Sign In action (similar UX to AdminLogoPage).
When authenticated, the page shows a create-story form with inputs for Title, Category (selecting from the existing categories list), and Full story text.
The form accepts and preserves Hindi/Devanagari text in Title and Full story text inputs without rendering issues.
The page is responsive and usable on mobile screens (no horizontal overflow; inputs/buttons fit within viewport).

requirements.text: Add frontend data layer support to create stories by calling the backend addStory method, and invalidate/refetch relevant story queries (latest, category, and search) after a successful create.

quotes: Create admin panel to add horror stories.

acceptanceCriteria: Submitting the form calls the backend to create a story.
After successful creation, the app refreshes the latest stories list so the new story can appear without a hard reload.
Error states (including unauthorized/admin-only errors) are surfaced to the user in a readable message on the admin story page.

requirements.text: Add routing and navigation access for the new admin story page, including a route under /admin (e.g., /admin/stories or /admin/story/new) and a visible navigation entry for authenticated users alongside the existing admin logo link.

quotes: Create admin panel to add horror stories.

acceptanceCriteria: A new route exists for the admin story creation page and can be visited directly by URL.
When authenticated, the site header navigation shows a link to the admin story creation page (desktop and mobile menus).
When not authenticated, the admin story creation page is still routable but shows the auth-required state instead of the form.

constraints: Do not edit any files under frontend/src/hooks/useInternetIdentity.ts, frontend/src/hooks/useInternetIdentity.tsx, frontend/src/hooks/useActor.ts, frontend/src/main.tsx, or frontend/src/components/ui (compose these components instead).
Respect the existing backend single-actor architecture; do not introduce additional backend services.
nonGoals: Implementing thumbnail image upload for stories.
Implementing optional video (YouTube link or video upload) for stories.
Implementing edit/delete story functionality in the admin UI.
Changing the existing homepage story ordering logic beyond ensuring it continues to show newest-first from getLatestStories.
